events.message: Filed a claim this morning after my car was hit at a red light. The other driver ran a red and collided with the driver side of my vehicle.
Your claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report regarding the collision with another vehicle.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to manage your case and assist you through the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and assure you that we will handle it promptly and with care to reach a resolution.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle parts, a police report, and your driverâ€™s license to continue the claim process.
All requested documents, including photos and the official police report, have been submitted successfully to support the claim.
Our claims investigation is now underway to verify the details of the accident and assess the damage to the vehicle.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed with a detailed report assessing the extent of the damages.
A settlement proposal has been made based on the investigation findings, covering repairs and applicable coverage under your policy.
You have provided positive feedback on the proposed settlement amount and the handling of your claim so far.
Your auto accident claim has been formally approved after agreement on the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved settlement has been issued to cover the necessary vehicle repairs and other related expenses.
The claim has been successfully closed following payment issuance and completion of all required processes.
All documents and case files relating to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
